name: Mini Top Hat Crochet Pattern
description:
THIS IS A CROCHET PATTERN ONLY, NOT A FINISHED PRODUCT.

This listing is for an amazing photo prop!! A mad hatter, mini top hat. Crochet a mini top hat for a photo shoot, to take along with you to your child's photo session, to sell, or make as a gift. These little hats are simply adorable!

Adorn the hat with a ribbon band, silk flower, rolled flower, or crochet the one in the pattern! Feathers and netting add a nice touch. Directions are included for attaching a headband, as well.

DO NOT copy or redistribute this pattern. You may make and sell as many as you would like, however. You may reference my shop if you are selling, but it is not necessary.

name: Mini Pillbox Hat Crochet Pattern
description:
THIS IS A CROCHET PATTERN ONLY, NOT A FINISHED PRODUCT.

This listing is for an amazing photo prop!! A vintage inspired mini pillbox hat. Crochet one of these cuties for a photo shoot, to take along with you to your child's photo session, to sell, or make as a gift. These little hats are simply adorable!

Sizing
Small - for an infant or young baby
Larger - for a child/tween/adult

Adorn the hat with a ribbon band, silk flower, rolled flower, or crochet the one in the pattern! Feathers and netting add a nice touch. Directions are included for attaching a headband, as well.

This PDF is promised to be emailed to you within 24 hours of payment.

Due to the nature of patterns, this pattern may not be returned or exchanged. All sales are final. If you have questions or concerns I will do my best to help you via email at monkeyshinedesigns @ hotmail . com

You will need Adobe to read this pattern; it can be downloaded online (www.adobe.com).

DO NOT copy or redistribute this pattern. You may make and sell as many as you would like, however. You may reference my shop if you are selling, but it is not necessary.

www.sugarplumstudios.com

name: Mini Crown PDF Crochet Pattern
description:
THIS IS A CROCHET PATTERN ONLY, NOT A FINISHED PRODUCT.

This listing is for an adorable photo prop!! A mini crown. Crochet a mini crown for a photo shoot, to take along with you to your baby's photo session, to sell, or make as a gift. These little crowns are simply adorable!

Sizing:
3 versions:
Tiara Princess
Princess
Prince
ALL measure 8 1/2 inches around the base

Skill Level:
easy/early intermediate

Materials Needed:
E/4-3.50 mm hook
Light Weight Yarn (3)

This PDF is promised to be emailed to you within 24 hours of payment.

name: Birthday Hat PDF Crochet Pattern
description:
THIS IS A CROCHET PATTERN ONLY, NOT A FINISHED PRODUCT.

This listing is for an adorable birthday hat to crochet for your child, grandchild, or as a gift! This hat comes with directions for three variations on edges: pom-pom, fur, or scalloped. There are directions for the spots as well, as many other creative suggestions to customize this little gem. Color-coordinate with the birthday theme! These would be perfect for cake smash photo shoots as well! One size fits all.

Sizing:
one size

Skill Level:
easy

This PDF is promised to be emailed to you within 24 hours of payment.

Due to the nature of patterns, this pattern may not be returned or exchanged. All sales are final. If you have questions or concerns I will do my best to help you via email at monkeyshinedesigns @ hotmail . com

name: Pumpkin Beanie Crochet Pattern
description:
This listing is for an adorable pumpkin beanie PDF PATTERN. (THIS IS NOT A FINISHED PRODUCT.)

Crochet an adorable pumpkin beanie for your little pumpkin, or as a gift! Feel free to sell as many pumpkin beanies as you would like, but do NOT sell my pattern. This pattern is my own creation, please do not copy or redistribute it.

The sizing for this pattern is only 0-3 months at this time (14" around). It does stretch a bit, and extra rows can be added for a larger size. I would rate this pattern at an intermediate level.

When payment is made, you should receive your pattern within 24 hours. If for some reason you did not receive your pattern, please send me a convo. and I will get it to you as soon as possible. Don't forget to check your spam box if you haven't received your pattern after 24 hours. You will need Adobe Acrobat Reader to view this pattern, which is available for free on the Internet (www.adobe.com).

As this is a pattern, all sales are final. If you need help with the pattern, feel free to email me at monkeyshinedesigns {at} hotmail {dot} com, and I will do my best to assist you.
